document_name: Officialization of the Country Carbon Program Neutrality 2.0
document_url: https://cdn.climatepolicyradar.org/CRI/2018/CRI-2018-05-28-Officialization of the Country Carbon Program Neutrality 2.0_459dbc58681158f0ad95f2d7dca331a4.pdf
document_description: This Decree formalises the Carbon Neutrality 2.0 Country Program in the organisational and cantonal categories. The Program's objective is to provide a mechanism to recognise the proper management of Greenhouse Gas (GHG) emissions to public, private organisations, cantons, district councils and/or communities. The requisites are found in the Annex to this decree and form an integral part of it. The MINAE Climate Change Directorate (DCC) is the entity in charge of the Program.
